sentences.sContent: We could go back to my cottage and have lunch there.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以回到我的小屋去吃午饭。

sentences.sContent: Scotland? I’ve always wanted to go there.
sentences.sCn: 苏格兰？我一直想去那儿。

sentences.sContent: Hold it right there and don’t move.
Can you pass me that wine glass there?
sentences.sCn: 你能把那个葡萄酒杯递给我吗？

sentences.sContent: Look, there’s that bookshop I was telling you about.
sentences.sCn: 看，那就是我跟你说过的那家书店。

sentences.sContent: It’s too far to drive there and back in one day.
Are we going to get there (= arrive ) before the banks close?
sentences.sCn: 银行关门之前，我们到得了吗？

synos.tran: 在那里；在那边；在那点上

phrases.pCn: 到达那里；取得成功，实现目标
这边请；这下你会懂了；你又来这一套
不相干；与题目不相干；不重要

words.tran: 从而，因此；在那附近；在那方面

trans.tranCn: 在那里；在那边；在那点上
trans.tranOther: in or to a particular place that is not where you are
used to express satisfaction that you have been proved right or that you have done what you intended to do
